channel.title: Dessert – Cloud Chemistry
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Order™

item.title: Neon
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A blend of creamy vanillas with an assertive coconut finish.
item.content:encoded: Neon is an esteemed mix of creamy and arromatic vanillas, toasted coconuts, and savory butter rum. This blend is in a category all its own; and is commonly recommended to the intrepid palate who seeks to satisfy a curious craving.

item.title: Eclipse
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Strawberries and cream with citrus and mint accents.
item.content:encoded: Every eLiquid brand has a strawberry custard blend; but, as this recipe testifies, not all strawberry custards are created equal. Eclipse features ripe and succulent strawberries, sweet vanilla custard, and our very own house lemon-lime. On the inhale, the sweetness of the strawberries and the subtlety of the custard come together in perfect harmony. On the exhale, the lemon-lime cuts through the sweetness ever so slightly and carries the flavors perfectly. But we didnt stop there. Eclipse also has a touch of cool mint to bring it all together for a strawberry custard experience that is without equal.

item.title: Axis
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A scintillating cookie sandwhich stuffed with pistachio cream.
item.content:encoded: Axis is an ingenious cookie sandwhich that’ll have you paying your homage to the chef. On the inhale, you will experience the soft sugar cookie, while on the exhale your taste buds are rightly pampered by sweet pistachio cream. We can’t make these bottles fast enough.

item.title: Nucleus
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Whipped banana pudding with vanilla cookie crumbles.
item.content:encoded: With rich, creamy banana pudding at the forefront, and soft vanilla wafers as the supporting cast, this blend will have you feeling like a kid again. Holding it all together is a cinnamon graham cracker crust imbued with vanilla. Nucleus is the dessert flavor that acts like an entrée.

item.title: Apex
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Cinnamon french toast with buttery maple syrup and vanilla.
item.content:encoded: Apex is a simple yet altogether heavenly presentation of cinnamon french toast and mouthwatering buttery maple syrup. For a delicate addition of flavor and aroma, we add just a pinch of vanilla bean. If you wake up with a sweet tooth, this may be the cure.

item.title: Polaris
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A gratifying blend of melon and cream with quiet citrus notes.
item.content:encoded: A delicate and delectable melon parfait with subtle notes of mango and honeysuckle. Polaris starts with a sweet, tangy vanilla custard, which is then topped with savory, toasted slivers of walnut and coconut. This blend has consistently impressed both fruit and dessert connoisseurs.

item.title: Carbon
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Classic lemon bar cookies enhanced by vanilla bean extract.
item.content:encoded: Carbon is a scrumptious lemon bar consisting of sweet lemon meringue and lemon puree. To further bolster this lemony confection, we skillfully weave in layers of graham cracker and vanilla custard. The end result is a downright mouthwatering experience.

item.title: Cupid
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A crispy butter cookie with strawberry jam.
item.content:encoded: Savory butter cookies and sweet strawberry jam come together to make this delectable, mouthwatering blend. The recipe features both sweet and savory notes of crispy butter cookies on the inhale, and lucsious sweet strawberry jam on the exhale.

item.title: Patmos
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A lemon and hazelnut cookie topped with powdered sugar.
item.content:encoded: Patmos was inspired by the soft and crumbly Italian wedding sugar-cookies, on which we sprinkled our special mojo. This sophisticated recipe features robust, nutty hazelnut and aromatic vanilla, with a little lemon zest to round things out. This cookie vape will have you hearing wedding bells.

item.title: Morpheus
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Everyone's favorite teddy bear shaped, cinnamon graham cracker cookies.
item.content:encoded: Everyone’s favorite snack has just become everyone’s favorite vape. Morpheus is our take on those tiny teddy bear graham crackers we all love so much. Cinnamon, sugar, vanilla, and grahahm cracker blend together to make the perfect snack-time vape.
